data.name: RTK13WPK - Fan selected Re-Releases Officer Graphic Set ④ ファンが選ぶ復刻武将CGセット④
data.detailed_description:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

Officer graphics for Tao Jun (RTK X) and Zhao Yun (RTK 11) will be added. These officers were selected by fans from among previous titles.

▼Added Officers Graphics
Tao Jun/Zhao Yun

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select one of the applicable officers listed above. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the appropriate graphic from the Special tab. Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
data.about_the_game:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

Officer graphics for Tao Jun (RTK X) and Zhao Yun (RTK 11) will be added. These officers were selected by fans from among previous titles.

▼Added Officers Graphics

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select one of the applicable officers listed above. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the appropriate graphic from the Special tab. Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
